programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Stockholm Syndrome: Howard and Bernadette go on a trip without their children, Leonard and Penny try to keep a secret, and Raj makes a new friend. (S12 Ep24/24)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Pilot: The first ever episode of the hit sitcom. Leonard and Sheldon's geeky world is shaken up by the arrival of a beautiful new neighbour. (S1 Ep1/17)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Big Bran Hypothesis: Sheldon sneaks into Penny's flat to tidy it. She's not happy about it. (S1 Ep2/17)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A German Folk Song and an Actual Adult: Georgie goes on a birthday date, and Sheldon takes an interest in Missy's favourite TV show. (S6 Ep17)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Little Green Men and a Fella's Marriage Proposal: Sheldon wants to search for life on other planets, and Missy is caught between two friends. (S6 Ep18)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Airport 2010: For Jay's birthday, Gloria surprises him with a getaway to Hawaii - but she's invited the whole family. And there's no greater test than travelling with the family. (S1 Ep22)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Hawaii: A relaxing family vacation in Hawaii gets slightly derailed when everyone has their own ideas of fun. (S1 Ep23)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Gone Maggie Gone: When Marge is temporarily blinded, Homer loses Maggie to a convent and Lisa has to go undercover as a nun to find her. (S20 Ep13/21)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: In the Name of the Grandfather: Homer takes the family to Ireland so that Grampa can visit quaint village pub O'Flanagan's one last time. (S20 Ep14/21)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Shiksa Indeterminacy: Leonard, Raj and Howard all fall heavily for Sheldon's twin sister, but when Leonard comes up with a plan to win her heart, it's derailed by Sheldon. (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Peanut Reaction: Penny throws a surprise party for Leonard, with help from Howard and Raj, but Sheldon's indulgence in an electronics shop throws her off track. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Tangerine Factor: When Penny breaks up with her boyfriend, Leonard plucks up the courage to ask her out. And each of them turns to Sheldon for advice about their date. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Old Man and the Lisa: Mr Burns loses all his money and employs Lisa to help him earn back his fortune. But they don't see eye to eye over ethical issues. (S8 Ep21/25)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Undercover Burns: Mr Burns goes undercover to see what the employees really think of him, and becomes their friends - to Smithers' alarm... (S32 Ep1)

programme.title: New: Married at First Sight...

programme.title: The Inbetweeners

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: Bunk Off: Will, Simon, Jay and Neil bunk off school. They go to Neil's house to get drunk, and Simon has a vodka-induced romantic revelation about his childhood sweetheart Carli. (S1 Ep2/6)

programme.title: PL: United v Man City 94/95
programme.desc: United Archives 10/11/94. A classic derby encounter as Brian Horton brought his team across the city to Old Trafford.

programme.title: PL: United v Ipswich 94/95
programme.desc: United Archives 4/3/95. An amazing goal-fest at the Theatre of Dreams in March 95 as Andy Cole scored five times in an historic 9-0 victory over Ipswich Town.

programme.title: PL: Bolton v United 95/96
programme.desc: United Archives 25/2/96. With a huge trip to Newcastle looming, United looked to keep the pressure on at the top by beating struggling Bolton.

programme.title: PL: United v Nottm Forest 95/96
programme.desc: United Archives 28/4/96. United ended their home campaign against Nottingham Forest, knowing that a win would take them to the brink of the Premiership title.

programme.title: PL: United v Sunderland 96/97
programme.desc: United Archives 21/12/96. United took on Sunderland for the first time in the Premier League on what was to be a memorable afternoon at the Theatre of Dreams.

programme.title: PL: Nottm Forest v United 98/99
programme.desc: United Archives 6/2/99. Former United boss Ron Atkinson was hoping to get one over his old club when they visited the City Ground with Forest deep in relegation trouble.

programme.title: PL: United v Bradford 00/01
programme.desc: United Archives 5/9/00. United battered the Bantams in impressive style with Teddy Sheringham and Quinton Fortune hitting a brace each.

programme.title: PL: United v Southampton 00/01
programme.desc: United Archives 28/10/00. United welcomed struggling Southampton looking to keep up their scintillating home form, having scored 22 goals in their opening six league contests at the Theatre of Dreams.

programme.title: PL: United v Arsenal 00/01
programme.desc: United Archives 25/2/01. United welcomed Arsenal knowing that victory would move them closer to securing a third consecutive Premiership crown.

programme.title: PL: United v Derby 01/02
programme.desc: United Archives 12/12/2001. After 3 Successive League defeats, United hoped to rediscover their form at home to Derby.

programme.title: PL United v Southampton 01/02
programme.desc: United Archives 22/12/01. Sir Alex's side took on Southampton with the visitors looking for their first win at Old Trafford since January 1988.

programme.title: PL: United v Blackburn 10/11
programme.desc: United Archives 27/11/10. The Reds looked to make it 20 Premier League games unbeaten as they welcomed Big Sam's Blackburn to Old Trafford.

programme.title: Top 20 Cristiano Ronaldo Goals
programme.desc: To mark his 40th birthday, we've ranked Cristiano Ronaldo's greatest goals for United.

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 07/08
programme.desc: United Archives 12/1/08. An uneventful first half is quickly forgotten about when United put Newcastle to the sword in the final 45.

programme.title: PL: United v Arsenal 11/12
programme.desc: United Archives 28/8/11. The Reds welcomed an Arsenal side who had made a slow start to the season. With the Gunners hampered by injuries and suspensions, could Sir Alex's men take advantage?

programme.title: PL: Bolton v United 11/12
programme.desc: United Archives 10/9/11. United enjoyed a stellar start to the 2011/12 season, underlined at The Reebok Stadium with a 5 star performance against Bolton.

programme.title: PL: United v Southampton 00/01
programme.desc: United Archives 28/10/00. United welcomed struggling Southampton looking to keep up their scintillating home form, having scored 22 goals in their opening six league contests at the Theatre of Dreams.

programme.desc: A Sizeable Problem: When a meteorite falls near the log cabin, strange berries start to grow. One of their properties is that they make those who eat them grow to disproportionate sizes. (S1 Ep27)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Treasure Bear: Under the wood floor of the log cabin, Grizzy and the lemmings discover the entrance to an underground gallery. (S1 Ep28)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: In the Service of His Majesty: When Grizzy brandishes an Indian sceptre that the lemmings brought home, the lemmings bow low before him and behave like servants. (S1 Ep29)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Art: Grizzy tries to impress the she-bear by making a sculpture of her from a piece of wood. But as soon as the artist's back is turned, the lemmings gnaw at the work of art. (S1 Ep30)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Happy Birthday Lemmings!: The Lemmings throw a surprise birthday party for one of the clan. (S1 Ep31)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Flower Power: A gust of wind sweeps away the flower that Grizzy's adored she-bear wears in her hair. Grizzy sees this as a golden opportunity to dazzle her by bringing it back. (S1 Ep32)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Teleportation's the Way to Go!: Grizzy finds two identical vases in a Native American Indian chest. If he sticks his hand in one, it comes out the other! (S1 Ep33)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Countdown: Grizzy finds a vintage stopwatch in the garage which lets you wind back the minute that has just passed by, and it can even stop time and movement in one's surroundings. (S1 Ep34)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Airlines: Grizzy is disturbed in the middle of his snack by a strange flow of objects that have been transformed into hot air balloons. (S1 Ep35)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Relax Bear: Grizzy discovers with that the ranger has purchased a new recliner. But even an armchair designed for relaxation can be used for other purposes by the Lemmings! (S1 Ep36)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Snow Country For Old Men: In an attempt to win the holidays, Chef brings snowmen to life. But when they turn out to be evil, Chef and the kids have to jingle some bells. (S2 Ep42)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Gold And The Stickerful: Courtney becomes infatuated with a new gold sticker incentive program that Chef introduces to the class. (S2 Ep43)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Bad Seed: Chef introduces the kids to agriculture by teaching them how to grow plants from seeds. But when Izzy shows her seed too much love, it turns into a monster! (S2 Ep44)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Fish Called Leshawna: After eating some mystery fish sticks, Leshawna achieves every little girl's dream and transforms into a mermaid! (S2 Ep45)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Double Oh Beth: With most of the class already gone for spring break, a villain infiltrates the school. Luckily a sleeper agent has been lying in wait. Hold on... it's Beth?!? Oh boy... (S2 Ep46)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Duncan Duty: When Duncan realises Chef is getting kids to tattle on him in return for chocolate milk, he sees an opportunity. (S2 Ep47)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Encore'tney: When Courtney turns to a magical datebook to help her achieve perfection, she's trapped in a never-ending loop until a friend teaches her a valuable lesson. (S2 Ep48)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Life Of Pie: When Izzy, Jude and Owen accidentally bring a pizza to life they do everything they can to help it find a new purpose in life, other than being eaten. (S2 Ep49)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Augmented Bear: The Lemmings have discovered a new game: an augmented reality program on the ranger's digital tablet. (S1 Ep64)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemmings Under Pressure: The only edible food left in the ranger's cabin is a salmon, which is stuck inside a block of ice in the freezer. Grizzy decides to melt the ice with the blow-dryer. (S1 Ep65)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemmings in Space: The Lemmings have unearthed a box filled with birthday fireworks. (S1 Ep66)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Sniffer Sniffler Raccoon: Grizzy's last jar of chocolate spread has been pinched by the Lemmings, who are savouring it in secret. (S1 Ep67)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Transformational Bear: Grizzy uses the Lemmings' radio-controlled toy robot as a butler. (S1 Ep68)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Shaken-Up Bear: The vibrations created by Grizzy's snoring during his nap give the Lemmings an idea for a bouncing game. (S1 Ep69)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Piata Party: Grizzy finds a birthday piata in the ranger's living room. (S1 Ep70)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Game: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a magical Game of the Goose. The events displayed in the squares that the players land on come true in real life. (S1 Ep71)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Ranger Lemming: Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. (S1 Ep72)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Yng nghanol y goedwig, allwch chi glywed yr holl synau gwahanol? Ma Harmoni, Melodi a Bop eisiau gwybod pwy sy'n swnio fel ffliwt. Harmoni, Melodi and Bop wonder who makes a hooting sound.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Heddiw mae Ben Dant yn ymuno disgyblion Ysgol Y Graig, Merthyr Tudful i greu trysor penigamp. Ben Dant is on a new adventure to recycle and turn rubbish and waste into a masterpiece.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: I ddal y lladron sydd wedi dwyn y pencadfws, mae'n rhaid i Gwil a'r cwn eu hachub yn gyntaf. To catch the rogues who have stolen the Paw Patroller, Gwil and co have to rescue them first!

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Pan ma Crawc yn achosi ton enfawr i ddymchwel gwl y dyfrgwn Pwti sy'n achub y dydd. Everyone's too busy to play with Toad so he foolishly opens the lockgate in order to propel his new boat.

programme.title: Y Diwrnod Mawr
programme.desc: Dathliad Eid al Fitr fydd diwrnod mawr Jaleel ac mae'n astudio Arabeg, mynd i'r mosg ac agor ffenestri ei galendr Ramadan i baratoi. Jaleel's big day will be the Eid al Fitr celebration.

programme.title: Brethyn a Fflwff
programme.desc: Mae Fflwff yn chwarae gyda rhywbeth bach meddal, ond 'dyw Brethyn ddim yn sicr o ble ddaeth e. Gall Brethyn ddatrys y dirgelwch mawr? Fluff plays with a little soft mysterious thing.

programme.title: New: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Twm Twrch a'i ffrindiau yn yr opera heno gyda gweddill tyrchod Cwmtwrch. Ond mae helynt yn digwydd! Twm Twrch and friends are at the opera tonight with the rest of Cwmtwrch.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Yn rhaglen heddiw, mae Ceris yn holi, 'Pam bod enwau gyda ni?' Mae Tad-cu'n sn am amser pan taw Ceri oedd enw pawb yn y byd! In today's programme, Ceris asks 'Why do we have names?'.

programme.title: New: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Joni'n meddwl bo planhigion yn ddiflas, ond mae'n newid ei feddwl diolch i bersawr Lili Lafant a bwystfil o blanhigyn! Joni thinks plants are boring - but he soon changes his mind!

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth, wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai as they search for a new shell for Cranc !

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae'r criw yn brwydro i achub haid o ddolffiniaid troelli sy'n ymddangos eu bod yn nofio yn eu cwsg. A struggle to save a pod of spinner dolphins who seem to be swimming in their sleep.

programme.title: Cywion Bach
programme.desc: Brwsh gwallt, brwsh llawr, brwsh dannedd. Ie 'brwsh' yw'r gair heddiw. Dere ar antur geiriau gyda'r Cywion Bach. 'Brwsh' (brush) is the word today. Come on a word adventure with the Cywion!

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Pan mae Pablo'n cael jam ar ei fysedd - nid yw'r anifeiliaid yn gwybod beth i'w wneud o'r olion sydd yn cael eu gadael ar y darlun. Pablo gets jammy fingerprints all over his picture today!

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi i blant meithrin sy'n cynnwys sgetsys, eitemau doniol, jcs a chymeriadau dwl newydd sbon. A comedy show for pre-school children, full of sketches, jokes and fun!

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae Ffwffa a Bobo wrth eu bodd yn chwarae trn, ond mae eu bryd ar yrru trn stm go iawn. Ffwffa and Bobo love playing trains, but what they'd really like to do is drive the cloudy train.

programme.title: Dathlu 'Da Dona
programme.desc: Ymunwch Dona Direidi wrth iddi gynnal parti pen-blwydd llawn gemau, hwyl, dawnsio a chanu. Today, Joshua will be having a fancy-dress party with Tara Tan Toc.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw byddwn ni'n teithio i gyfandir Ewrop er mwyn dweud "Ol" wrth wlad Portiwgal. We're off to Portugal to learn more about Pastel De Nata, the Portuguese language and Fado music.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'n ddiwrnod chwaraeon Pentre Papur Pop! On today's poptastic adventure, it's a Pop Paper City sports day! Mai-Mai is the sports day judge!

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Newyddion i blant hyd at 6 oed fydd yn diddannu ac yn eu dysgu am y byd o'u cwmpas, yn ei holl amrywiaeth. News for children up to 6 years old, to entertain and educate them about the world.

programme.title: Brethyn a Fflwff
programme.desc: Mae Brethyn a Fflwff yn dod o hyd i lithren! Mae Brethyn yn darganfod bod Fflwff yn hoffi mynd i FYNY yn lle LAWR. Tweedy and Fluff find a slide, which they have lots of fun on!

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Twm Twrch yn egluro i bawb yng Nghwmtwrch fod pobl yn ymolchi bob dydd gan nad ydyn nhw'n hoffi bryntni a mwd. The moles get frightened as they start to believe that mud is dangerous.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Ffilmiau! Mae Tad-cu'n adrodd stori ddwl a doniol am serennu yn y ffilm gynta' erioed gyda chreadur arallfydol o'r gofod o'r enw Bp Bb. Gweni asks Tad-cu 'How were movies invented?'.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae rhywbeth yn bod ar y Jet-faneg, sy'n achosi i Joni symud yn gynt na gweddill y byd. Something is wrong with the Jet-glove, which causes Joni to move faster than the rest of the world.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai on a magical and playful adventure.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Coch a Glas yn cyfarfod Melyn ac mae'r triawd yn cael hwyl yn paentio glan y mr. Red and Blue meet Yellow and have fun colouring the seaside.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Pan ma Crawc yn achosi ton enfawr i ddymchwel gwl y dyfrgwn Pwti sy'n achub y dydd. Everyone's too busy to play with Toad so he foolishly opens the lockgate in order to propel his new boat.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach
programme.desc: Dysgwn am y pethau hynaf ar ein planed - y Ddaear ei hun, coed, adeiladau a henebion fel Cor y Cewri, cestyll gwahanol ac offerynnau hen fel y Sither Tsieineaidd. We learn about Dinosaurs.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae'n ben-blwydd ar rywun yn yr harbwr heddiw, ond pwy? Someone is celebrating a birthday today but who?

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae Harri'n cael galwad i ddweud fod gan Elin Fflur deiar fflat ar ei char, felly ffwrdd a fo i Langefni i'w drwsio. Harri gets a call to say that Elin Fflur's car has a flat tyre.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C

programme.desc: Geraint Hardy sydd yn 'Codi Pac' ac yn ymlwybro o gwmpas Cymru - a thref Rhuthun sy'n serennu yr wythnos hon. Join Geraint Hardy as he discovers what Ruthin has to offer. [SL]

programme.title: Byd Eithafol Neo-Nazis yn Ein Plith
programme.desc: Y newyddiadurwr Maxine Hughes sy'n ymchwilio i'r bechgyn Cymraeg sy'n cael eu radicaleiddio gan neo-Nazis. We look into the number of teenage boys being groomed and radicalised by neo-Nazis.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae'r Tralalas yn enwi pob anifail sy'n byw yn yr anialwch, ond allwch chi enwi'r planhigyn pigog sy'n tyfu mewn lle poeth a sych fel hyn? The Tralalas explore the hot and dry desert.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae'r gwencod yn clywed fod Crawc ofn bwganod brain ac yn manteisio ar y ffaith i ddychryn Crawc allan o'i gartref. The weasels hear of Toad's fear of scarecrows.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu a throi sbwriel yn sbeshal, a gwastraff yn gampwaith. Today, Ben Dant will be joining pupils at Ysgol Beca to create excellent treasure.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Pan aiff Jet-fam i hedfan efo Jetboi, ceisia Joni wneud popeth y ffordd 'iawn', gan amau ei fod ar brawf. When Jet-mom goes to fly with Jet-boy, Joni tries to do it all the 'right' way.

programme.title: Byd Rwtsh Dai Potsh
programme.desc: Mae Pwpgi yn bwyta swper y Potshiwrs a mae Dai yn gorfod mynd i bysgota er mwyn bwydo'r teulu. Fuzzypeg the dog eats the Spuds' fish supper and Dave is tasked with catching another.

programme.desc: Mae Dr. Alfa yn credu'n gryf yn ei robotiaid, Yr Alfabots ac mae rhannau helaeth o'r ddinas yn cael eu rheoli gan yr Alfabots. The girls expose how hot Alvah's new Alvahbots really are.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Wrth i Elen wynebu penderfyniad anodd i ddiswyddo staff o'r ysgol, mae Gwenno a Sophie'n ymateb yn go wahanol. Dani is shocked when she hears the reason for Copa's books not balancing.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindiau

programme.desc: Mae pawb yn Ocido'n paratoi i wylio dawns y dolffin ger ynys Llinos Llosgfynydd. Ond mae cymylau'n cuddio'r ynys! The Ocido crew get ready to watch the dolphin's dance but clouds appear!

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Huw a chriw o ffrindiau yn adeiladu rafft, ac fe gawn ni gwrdd a Hetti a'i cheffyl, Bunny. Today, Meleri will be meeting Megan and a lot of pigeons!

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Y tro hwn "Mynd Drot Drot" - cn draddodiadol am fam yn mynd i'r farchnad i siopa. This time "Mynd Drot Drot" - a traditional song about a mother going shopping to the market.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Leisa angen pysen i chwarae gm bl-droed gyda gwelltyn. Mae Hywel, y ffermwr hud, yma i helpu. Hywel, the magical farmer, shows Leisa where the peas are hiding on the farm.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: New: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Guto Gwningen a'i ffrindiau. The animated tales of a little bunny and his friends.

programme.title: Amser Maith Maith Yn Ol
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Grwygyn y gwas yn sl yn ei wely. Mae Siwan a Llywelyn yn bryderus iawn, rhag i Dafydd bach gael ei heintio. Today, somebody in Llys Llywelyn is sick.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd yr Olobobs heddiw? What's happening in the Olobobs' world today?

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Beth yw dawns yr 'hwyliau cyd-hwylio'? Mae Lewis y Goleudy ar fin darganfod sut beth yw'r ddawns arbennig hon! Lewis the lighthouse learns about the synchronised sailing dance.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Mae'r traeth yn llawn o ryfeddodau lliwgar. Mae Fflwff a'i fryd ar gysgodwr gwynt, a'r Capten a Seren a'u llygaid ar gylch rwber a pharasol. The beach is full of lovely colourful things!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Heledd angen gwneud cyflwyniad eisteddfod ac yn nerfus iawn. Diolch i Sin, mae ei chyflwyniad yn llwyddiant. Sin helps Heledd conquer her fear of speaking in public.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae'r gadwyn wedi torri ar feic Harri - lwcus mai i weithdy trwsio beics mae o'n mynd heddiw. The chain on Harri's bike has broken - lucky that he is going to a bike repair workshop today.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae Sara isie neud fideo roc o Trefor Ifans a'i iwcalele. Mae pethau'n mynd o chwith a Sam yw'r seren ond mae Trefor yn rocio! Sarah wants to make a rock video of Trevor and his ukulele.

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant bach gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series. Today's theme is milk.

programme.title: Da 'Di Dona
programme.desc: Mae Dona'n mynd i weithio mewn ysgol gynradd gyda Mrs Evans. Dona goes to work at a primary school with Mrs Evans.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Digbi'n sicr mai fo fydd y gorau yng nghystadlaethau Gemau Pen Cyll eto eleni. Ond a fydd o tybed? Digbi is sure he'll be best at all the events at the local Games. But will he?

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: A fydd criw o forladron bach Ysgol Llwyncelyn yn llwyddo i helpu Ben Dant a Cadi i drechu Capten Cnec a chipio'r ynys nl? Can the tiny pirates from Ysgol Llwyncelyn help Ben Dant & Cadi?

programme.title: Y Pitws Bychain
programme.desc: Mae tri morgrugyn yn dilyn Y Pitws mewn camgymeriad. Sut mae eu dychwelyd adref at eu teulu? Three ants follow the Pitws home by mistake - how will they get them back to their family?

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch a Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau - bydd cysgodion yn dawnsio a robotiaid yn chwarae! Join Jam on a musical adventure full of interesting sounds and pictures!

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindiau

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Huw yn ymuno chriw o ffrindiau i badlfyrddio, ac awn am dro i Blas Newydd, Ynys Mon gyda Elain, Beca a Nel. Today, Huw paddleboards, and Meleri plays tennis with Jack.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Hwiangerdd draddodiadol i suo plant bach i gysgu yw "Si Hei Lwli". "Si Hei Lwli" is a traditional nursery rhyme which helps children to fall asleep.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Tra bod Anti Mari yn chwilio am fisgedi i gael phaned, mae Leisa a Hywel y ffermwr hud ar antur yn Fferm Fach ac yn dysgu mwy am de! Leisa and Hywel the magical farmer learn about tea!

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Guto a'i ffrindiau heddiw? What happening in the world of Guto and his friends today?

programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Ednyfed Fychan, un o bobol pwysicaf Llywelyn wedi dod i'r Llys. Today in Amser Maith Maith yn l' one of Llywelyn's most important people, Ednyfed Fychan, has arrived.
